doc:
Kevin Peter Hall https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kevin_Peter_Hall 0 Kevin Peter Hall (May 9, 1955 – April 10, 1991) was an American actor best known for his roles as the title character in the first two films in the Predator franchise and the title character of Harry in the film and television series, Harry and the Hendersons. He also appeared in the television series Misfits of Science and 227, along with the film Without Warning. Kevin_Peter_Hall ( May_9_,_1955 – April_10_,_1991 ) was an_American_actor best_known for his_roles as the_title_character in the_first_two_films in the_Predator_franchise and the_title_character of Harry in the_film_and_television_series , Harry and the_Hendersons . He also appeared in the_television_series_Misfits of Science_and_227 , along with the_film Without Warning .
